name: niftii2png_activation_map
label: Nifti to png activation map
description: Creates activation map plots from niftii files and saves them as .png files.

fig_rez.description: Set the size of of the plotted activation map ('720p' or '1080p')

cmap.description: The colormap of the activation map. (e.g., 'gray', 'rainbow'). See README.md for all options.

author: NIPY <nipy.org>
